item.description:
I've wanted to try this place for years, but something always seems to come up.

No excuses this time! Falafels, grape leaves and more will be mine at East Side Pocket in Providence. I've heard that the food is great and the prices on the menu look quite reasonable.

This is a small establishment, and not exactly the type of place to take reservations. As such, I'm going to keep the RSVP limit for this event very low.

As always, new members are especially welcome to sign up!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a guy in a black jacket and probably a gray hat. Or try my cell (401) 699-7304

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch @ East Side Pocket (new members welcome)
